data.name: Midnight Ghost Hunt - Early Backer Pack
data.detailed_description:
Are you enjoying Midnight Ghost Hunt and want to know how you can support us further as we're doing our best to reach a 1.0 version? Do you wish to get more frights and additional ingenious gadgets in the future? Then this is the perfect pack for you to throw your money at. The Early Backer Pack is a means for those who wish to help to be able to do so.

As a heartfelt thank you, you'll get a couple of treats included in this pack:
  • A fancy in-game title that marks you out as a “Early Backer” for you to equip if you so wish
  • Unique Ghost Skin: The Lord as seen in our Cinematic Trailer
  • Unique Ghost Skin: The Lady famous from her appearance in the same Cinematic Trailer
  • R&R Hunter Skin: The Veteran who's been around the haunted blocks and is definitely getting too old for these shenanigans
  • R&R Hunter Skin: The Rookie who's new to the game but makes up for it with ambition and spunk
  • Bonus Emotes: As a thank you to our early adopters of this pack we decided to also throw in two unique emotes. The Gentleman bow and the Lady curtsey. Which is what we'd like to do for our generous Early Backers.

Important note: By buying this DLC you are first and foremost showing your support for the game and for us, the developers. The goodies included in the pack is just a bonus!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with at least 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We expect the minimum requirements to drop throughout early access as we continue to optimize and run hardware tests. Lower specs might stil perform fine.
